name: ChaosTower
description: Chaostower - Build and defend, a physics-based action puzzler. Build a tower from a whole bunch of different parts and prove it against several natural forces like earthquakes, wind and meteors. Defend your tower against artificial enemies, like robots, tanks, bomb-birds and many more.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core 2ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core 3ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450, Radeon HD 6670 Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: try it out its pretty good for a physics game
